column5: a snake bite killed a man near Ouphuud Ohor Trachor village
column7: Sampov Loun district.------According to his wife
column8: her husband left home at 6 am on December 10
column10: but never returned home.------The next morning villagers found the man lying dead in the field.------According to police
column11: the victims had a swollen leg and marks which corresponded with a bite from a venomous snake.------The body was handed over to the wife for the traditional festivals.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/394853
